text: Saint Bonaventure (1221â€“1274) was a scholastic theologian and a cardinal. He is one of the Doctors of the Church, and is remembered by Catholics on 15 July. Saint Bonaventure comes from Bagnoregio. He is the patron of children. ==Other websites== *Bonaventure at Catholic encyclopaedia Category:Christian saints Category:1221 births Category:1274 deaths
title: Bonaventure
